The custom is so unusual that a person who has his teeth
is considered ugly and occasionally when the Batoka borrowed
my looking glass the disparaging remarks would be made
respingrespecting boys ^ or girls who still retained their teeth "look at 'the great
teeth"!!" Some of 'the Makololo give a more facetious
explanation of 'the custom They say that 'the wife of a chief having
in a quarrel bit her husband's hand he in revenge ordered her
front teeth to be knocked out and all 'the men in 'the tribe followed
his example but this does not explain why they afterwards
knocked out their own The Batoka of 'the ZambesiZambezi are
generally very dark in colour and very degraded ^ & negro like in appearance
while those who live on 'the high lands we are now ascending
are frequently of 'the colour of coffee and milk We had a
large party of 'the Batoka of MokwinaeMokwine in our party sent by
